name: Achievement Lurker: Ballad of the Shimapan Warrior - King of Panties
name_original: Achievement Lurker: Ballad of the Shimapan Warrior - King of Panties
description:
Our magical warrior is on a really long bridge and he must find the other side! explore this epic bridge map! enjoy turn based combat along the way. Fight monsters. Gain XP in our level based XP system. There are also NPC's along the way that you can explore and find. You will also fight a boss fight. You will also collect cosmetic numbers as you play the game!

Turn based combat
XP system
Boss fight
NPC
